title: How do you carry as an ADC these days?
body:
I get fed in lane pretty often, but cancer like [Insert top/jungle champ here] will just 100-0 me in a combo.

If I sit back in teamfights and wait, its a 5v4 and my team comes out losing.
If I enter the fight or even the lane, [insert bruiser] just uses their super balanced point to click CC and ends me.

Half the time they can't even be CCd themselves during it.


Banshees veil is worthless because either they don't do magic damage and the MR is wasted (Vi, Noc, Panth) or they just decide to smite halfway through travelling and blow it.

I can't see what to do when my range is 550 and Ultimate abilities like Vi are 800. 


TLDR: "Either eat as many of their skills as you can and die hoping your team can finish the 5v5 without you" Vs "Sit and watch your team 5v4 hoping to clean up"



EDIT1: At 5-6 items it seems much easier, but mid game you are worth less than a caster minion.

replies.body:
The ADC role is in a terrible place right now.

With RIOT making Assassins and fighters nigh on invincible, ADCs have just become more and more incapable off impacting the game in the ways that they need to.

If the enemy assassin is even half decent, you WILL be dead right at the start of the fight... 
and now that there are at least 3 assassins in every game now, survival becomes pretty much impossible. 

There are only a few ADCs that can actually do anything atm, and thats Vayne _(well she is an assassin)_ Jhin _(when you outrange the enemy 3x over, how much damage they do becomes relative.)_ Caitlin _(same reason as jhin)_ Ezreal _(when no one can catch you, it becomes a lot easier to stay alive.)_ 
Draven and Lucian are also strong.
I'm a jungle main too, and i just feel bad for ADC's most games.

Yes I must say it does have its advantages, and recently the game has been a LOT less stagnant than previously!
(With the obvious outliers like Lee Sin/Yasuo/Zed/Vayne of course)

But it has given other classes some room to shine for sure! (with a slight bias towards assassins tho)

But I am thoroughly enjoying seeing some champs I haven't seen for ages coming out of the woodwork.

For example My friend has just started playing Diana, I personally don't play her, but I'm amazed at how well rounded she is as a champion, she is devastating when ahead (but not unstoppable) and weak when behind (but not weak enough to be completely useless) she is an assassin, but not one that can 1v3, get 2 kills and then escape (like Zed can).
It's champs like her that can hopefully redeem the assassin meta!

Also if you don't mind, as a jungle main, what is your view on ivern?
I'm a mid laner so i don't know much about the jungle, but I am loving ivern (im lvl 7 on him now) 
So as a jungle main, I'm just curious to know your thoughts on how he fits into the jungle as a whole?

Don't like him. He far too gimmicky without any real reliability for jungle control.
His kit feels more like a Support that prances around the jungle... so basically Bard but bleh.

I'd much rather play my main Diana or someone really fun like Rengar.
But people keep banning my Rengar pick so I have to choose my 100% winrate Xin.

>  Lucian are also strong.

Plz stop

I am seeing a lot of "Pick Vayne" andI 100% agree, I have no issue on Vayne. Shame she is banned most games. I am so desperately waiting for her to get nerfed in the patch so people stop banning her and I can play her.


I see "play Cait" but I find her mid game damage to be ass.

I hate Ezreal, blonde little bitch boy.
Oh you play Lucian. He's extremely weak right now. That's probably the main problem here.

ADCs need a lot of peel in the current tank meta. I despise playing it also when i get autofilled, usually because low elo "supports" are just retards who don't understand the game.

Add me in game if you need a support in flex queue. I already have a bunch of merrymen that I play with, usually my adc is Gold 1 player.
Cs and last hit plenty of it, play safe and don't feed. That's all I could say about it. :/
Just need a good support to make risky plays with you can go in on and get 3 kills then take 2 towers and a dragon
Depends on your elo. If you're under gold, yea its cancer. You'll start getting better supps plat and above. Also, find a duo supp. Atleast you'll have 1 peeling you in a teamfight.

Vayne.

Jhin.

Question has been answered.

Pick something like vayne, and have uncounterable stealth.

Seriously though if your picking something outside of {Vayne, Ezreal, Caitlyn} You're kinda asking to be shat on.
